title: From Insight to Action: What the 2025 SANS ICS/OT Security Report Means for You
description: Learn how to turn critical findings from the SANS State of ICS/OT Security 2025 report into practical steps to strengthen your industrial cyber resilience.…
content: For organizations operating critical infrastructure, security doesnt happen in isolation. Its measured in uptime, safety, and resilience. The SANS State of ICS/OT Security 2025 report, sponsored by F… [+4454 chars]
